attributes.action: Nominate Shaun Donnelly for an MBE for his services to GCSE students.
attributes.background: Shaun Donnelly makes videos for a channel called Fresesciencelessons, a YouTube channel which is universally popular with GCSE students across the country. We think the impact that this one man has had on the grades of GCSE students makes him worthy of an MBE to officially recognise his hard work.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
